item.title: Belgian-Dutch racing driver Verstappen wins Austin Grand Prix; The Red Bull star equals Vettel, Schumacher for most wins in a F1 season
item.description: Belgian-Dutch racing driver Verstappen wins Austin Grand Prix; The Red Bull star equals Vettel, Schumacher for most wins in a F1 season Verstappen passed Hamilton late to earn a record-tying 13th win of the season and delivered a victory to honor the memory of Red Bull team founder and owner Dietrich Mateschitz.

item.title: India grab 2 more medals in International Shooting Sport Federation (ISSF) World Championship Rifle/Pistol, Cairo
item.description: India grab 2 more medals in International Shooting Sport Federation (ISSF) World Championship Rifle/Pistol, Cairo India won two more medals on competition day 11 of the ISSF World Championship Rifle/Pistol at the Egypt International Olympic City (EIOC) Shooting Range in Cairo.

item.title: China's Wang, Sun crowned at World Table Tennis Champions Macao 2022
item.description: China’s Wang, Sun crowned at World Table Tennis Champions Macao 2022 Chinese paddlers Wang Chuqin, and Sun Yingsha were crowned champions in the men’s and women’s singles finals at the World Table Tennis (WTT) Champions Macao 2022

item.title: Golfer Rory McIlroy returns to top with CJ Cup win in South Carolina
item.description: Golfer Rory McIlroy returns to top with CJ Cup win in South Carolina Golfer Rory McIlroy returned to the top of the world rankings for the first time in more than two years by winning CJ Cup title in South Carolina on Sunday.
